name: campus-resale-hub
description: Campus Resale Hub - A marketplace for campus trading with real-time features

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: Remove-Item -Recurse -Force frontend/node_modules, backend/node_modules, frontend/dist, backend/dist -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
